detectors.description:
BERTToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BERTToken.sol#213-219) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BERTToken.sol#216)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BERTToken.sol#217)
